Crimes.Dispute_Type: Criminal extortion and refusal to pay
Crimes.Victim_Status: Individual targeted for non-payment of extortion
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Refusal to continue paying extortion led to escalated threats
Crimes.Mitigating_Factors: Risk deemed generalized rather than personalized
Crimes.Criminality_Severity: High – credible threats to life and safety
Crimes.Evidence_Sufficiency: Sufficient to establish general risk but not personalized risk
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Credible but insufficient to prove distinct risk
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: Risk present but not beyond that of general public
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Ongoing gang-related violence affecting general population
Crimes.Targeted_Individual_Status: Former extortion payer who refused further payments
Crimes.Geographic_Context: El Salvador – high levels of gang activity
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 97(1)(b) – need for protection based on personalized risk
Crimes.Outcome: Not recognized as a person in need of protection
Crimes.Procedural_Issues: Judicial review of Refugee Protection Division decision

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Criminal extortion and refusal to pay
Crimes.Victim_Status: Individual threatened after ceasing extortion payments
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Explicit threats to life after refusal to pay
Crimes.Mitigating_Factors: Widespread nature of gang threats reduces individualization
Crimes.Evidence_Sufficiency: Sufficient to confirm threats but not personalized risk
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Applicant testimony, context of gang violence in El Salvador
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: Risk assessed as shared by general population
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Pervasive threat environment due to gang activity
Crimes.Outcome: Not certified as person in need of protection
Crimes.Procedural_Issues: No error in procedural fairness identified

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Failure to comply with ongoing extortion demand
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Continued targeting after cessation of payments
Crimes.Criminality_Severity: High – linked to violent enforcement mechanisms
Crimes.Evidence_Sufficiency: Adequate to establish occurrence but not exceptional risk
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant believed but risk not individualized
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: Risk comparable to general public in El Salvador
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Systemic extortion practices by gangs across population
Crimes.Outcome: Not recognized as person in need of protection
Crimes.Procedural_Issues: Proper application of legal test for protection
